issue.title: dependency issues when installing from source

content.raw:
I used branch 3.0, but these issues were present in earlier versions as well (~v2.x) as I remember. 

Under ubuntu 12.04 in order to get it to run, I install `libogre-dev` (instead of `libogre-1.8-dev`) which comes with version 1.7.4-3 and then cmake does not complain (this install is similar to the one for version 1.9).

Under ubuntu 13.04  I couldn't figure out a work-around.
